Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory170.png'}
{1: '1', 2: '???', 3: 'I must give you credits for making it all the way here, heroes of the revelation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: 'And in front of you is Golden Jegan, one of the four Demon Generals.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: 'The last two guys had unusual names, but yours is just way too weird.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: 'You are no one to criticize me! Look at what you are wearing!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Golden Jegan pointed to Lee and Karenina. Their so-called "Coating" looked completely out of place.'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: "You heroes never change. The last generation also looked like clowns. Isn't it common sense to wear something formal and proper before fighting someone?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Were you there in the last war?', 3: '10', 4: "But we don't have anything else to wear.", 5: '11'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: 'Of course. I was the only Demon General who fought alongside His Majesty.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: "Oh c'mon. You heroes are way too wild.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Kamui', 3: 'A nice outfit would be nice before a Boss fight, but people often end up with a strange combination because they want best stats and skills.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: 'For example, wearing only one helmet and a gigantic sword because of load capacity...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: "Hmm... Can't fault them if it's for stats.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Kamui', 3: "I know right? You can't beat the enemy without stats.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Whatever... We have more important things to ask. Um, can I call you Demon General Golden Jegan?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: 'Oh, you are a polite one. You can call me anything. Anyway, what do you want?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'We want the artifact.', 3: '18', 4: 'We are looking for Liv.', 5: '21'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: "The Goddess' artifact... I saw this day coming ever since this castle was built.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: 'But I, Golden Jegan, will never let anyone take the artifact easily, let alone the heroes of revelation!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: 'You are our eternal enemies!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: 'Who is Liv...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "It's a girl with pink hair. Like these two, she is probably wearing something light.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: 'Pink... And strange outfit. I see. So you are looking for her.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Do you know anything? She's our friend...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: "She may also be a hero of the revelation, but she's our Holy Maiden! I will never tell you anything about her!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Holy Maiden!?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Golden Jegan', 3: 'Roarrrr!', 4: '2'}
{3: "Golden Jegan's attitude suddenly changed. His body started to expand, as if it was going to fill the entire space. "}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Wait! I really don't want to resolve this with violence!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Just let your fist do the talking!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia wanted to continue the negotiation, but Karenina just charged in.'}
{3: "Golden Jegan's body suddenly expanded again, transforming the nearby space into a new maze with Demon monsters inside."}
{3: 'He had escaped to somewhere deep inside the maze.'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Interesting. I'll crush you all into pieces!", 4: '1'}
